actionConfiguration.body:
with update_customer_collection_declation AS (
    UPDATE
        customer_collection_declation 
	SET
            shop_id={{ shop_id_data_edit.selectedOptionValue }},
						shop_name= {{"'" + shop_id_data_edit.selectedOptionLabel + "'"}},
						received_amount={{parseInt(collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.received_amount) + parseInt(received_amount_edit.text) }},
						adjusted_amount={{ adjusted_amount_edit.text }},
						unadjusted_amount={{ unadjusted_amount_edit.text }},
						proof_of_amount_received={{"'" + proof_doc_edit.image + "'"}},
						receive_date=cast({{"'" + moment(receive_date_edit).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') + "'"}} as timestamptz)
	where id = {{collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.id}}
),
ins_single_customer_collection_declation AS (
INSERT INTO
        single_customer_collection_declation (
						received_amount,
						adjusted_amount,
						unadjusted_amount,
						proof_of_amount_received,
						receive_date,
						customer_collection_declation_id
        )
    VALUES (
				{{ received_amount_edit.text }},
				{{ adjusted_amount_edit.text }},
				{{ received_amount_edit.text }},
				{{"'" + proof_doc_edit.image + "'"}},
				cast({{"'" + moment(receive_date_edit).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') + "'"}} as timestamptz),
				{{collection_declaration_tbl.triggeredRow.id}})
				returning id
)				
INSERT INTO
        customer_collection_declation_log (
						received_amount,
						adjusted_amount,
						unadjusted_amount,
						proof_of_amount_received,
						receive_date,
						single_customer_collection_declation_id
        )
    VALUES (
				{{ received_amount_edit.text }},
				{{ adjusted_amount_edit.text }},
				{{ received_amount_edit.text }},
				{{"'" + proof_doc_edit.image + "'"}},
				cast({{"'" + moment(receive_date_edit).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm') + "'"}} as timestamptz),
				(select id from ins_single_customer_collection_declation)
			)
				returning single_customer_collection_declation_id
